member.name: M:Serilog.AutodeskRevitLoggerConfigurationExtensions.WithRevitDocumentModelPath(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerEnrichmentConfiguration,Autodesk.Revit.UI.UIApplication,System.String)
member.summary:
Enrich log events with a ModelPath property.
If Document.IsModelInCloud is true enriches Document.GetCloudModelPath().
If Document.IsWorkshared is true enriches Document.GetWorksharingCentralModelPath().
member.param: Revit document model path. Default is .
